Class DrawingPaneController

java.lang.Object
com.demo.lab5.DrawingPaneController
public class DrawingPaneController extends Object
Controller for the main view of application which contains drawing area, buttons and menu..

      private final DrawingPaneStateManager stateManager

  • Method Details

    • onClear

      protected void onClear()
      Handles the clear button click event. Clears the drawing area.

    • onMousePressed

      protected void onMousePressed(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Handles the mouse pressed event. Creates a new shape or adds a node to the existing shape.

      Selection of a shape is created in the ShapeComponentView class.

      Parameters:
      event - mouse event

    • onMouseDragged

      protected void onMouseDragged(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Handles the mouse dragged event. Updates the size of the shape being drawn.
      Parameters:
      event - mouse event

    • onModeSelect

      protected void onModeSelect(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles selection mode button click event. Sets the mode to select shape. Also updates the cursor if mode changes.
      Parameters:
      event - click event
